basics.name: Rayhan Kafi Pratama
basics.label: Undergraduate of Computer Science at Bina Nusantara University.
basics.summary: Crafting scalable and resilient systems that turn ideas into reality. I excel in seamless integration, clean code, and robust infrastructure. Committed to continuous learning, I deliver high-performance solutions that optimize reliability and deliver meaningful impact.

work.name: PT. Gunung Amal Solution International
work.summary: Worked on a freelance basis for back-end development, including system and API development for an Audit Trail Management System project. Collaborated with Business Analysts to meet project-specific requirements.
responsibilities: Developed back-end systems and APIs for Audit Trail Management System.
Collaborated with Business Analysts to understand project requirements.
Designed system architecture and participated in code reviews.

work.name: PT. Khatulistiwa Nusantara Indonesia (KHANSIA)
work.summary: Assisted senior developers in building and maintaining back-end systems for mobile applications, gaining hands-on experience with back-end technologies.
responsibilities: Assisted in building and maintaining back-end systems for mobile applications.
Participated in Agile development processes including sprint planning and daily stand-ups.
Integrated back-end functionalities with front-end user interfaces.

education.summary: Specialization in Software Engineering, with a focus on Back-End Development. Courses include Data Structures, Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, and Software Development. Participated in various hackathons and coding competitions.

Graduated as a top student, gained expertise in web and mobile development, and software methodologies. Served as a lab assistant, helping students with software engineering issues and providing technical support to teachers.

awards.title: Finalist of Chain Fusion Hacker House
Finalist of ICPC Asia Jakarta National Contest

projects.name: Kanjo
highlights: Implemented various machine learning models like Naive Bayes, SVM, and Random Forest for sentiment analysis.
Designed an intuitive Streamlit interface for easy model interaction.

projects.name: Shusseki
projects.description: Automated Attendance System using Facial Recognition.
highlights: Integrated facial recognition with OpenCV for real-time attendance tracking.
Achieved 95% accuracy in facial recognition under various lighting conditions.

projects.name: Yoru
highlights: Customized AwesomeWM environment with a focus on aesthetics and productivity.
Included several custom widgets for enhanced user experience.

projects.name: Identik
highlights: Developed a decentralized identity system using Motoko on the Internet Computer (ICP) blockchain.
Integrated multi-factor authentication for enhanced security.

projects.name: RAiso
projects.description: Renowned online stationery store using a layered architecture for separation of concerns and maintainability.
highlights: Implemented a layered architecture to separate concerns and improve maintainability.
Enhanced user experience with a modern and responsive UI design.

projects.name: PyQtLMS
projects.description: Yet Another Library Management System, created using PyQt5.
highlights: Developed a complete library management system with PyQt5.
Implemented a robust database system for efficient book management.

projects.name: Cursed
projects.description: Calendar based appointment and todo-list, created using the low-level library (ncurses.h).
highlights: Created a terminal-based calendar and todo-list application using ncurses.
Optimized for low-resource environments with minimalistic design.
